short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enhanced UI for Github project boards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to improve the usability of Github project boards. The columns will become responsive and will not overflow off screen. The add column button is moved up to the controls row. There is a new issue button added to the controls. Clicking on issue title will open issue in new window instead of showing summary view.
